attributes.background: Given the current economic crisis how can those representatives voted by the public take a pay rise on their own salary, voted by their own peers?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. MPs no longer have a role in deciding their pay and expenses.  

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
